titleStmt.title: Quatermayns conquest over Canterburies court, or, A briefe declaration of severall passages between him and the Archbishop of Canterbury with other commissioners of the High Commission Court, at six severall appearances before them, and by them directed to Doctor Featly : with their severall conferences, and the doctors by Roger Quatermayne.
titleStmt.author: Quatermayne, Roger.
Laud, William, 1573-1645.
Featley, Daniel, 1582-1645.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Paine, for Roger Quatermayne, and are to be sold by Samuell Satterthwaite ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
